page.title: 09A Primary School Day
page.content: School starts at{9.00 a.m.}and we have dinner at{12.00 o'clock}.Some people stay to a {packed lunch},others have{school dinners}.Very few people go home to dinner. These are some of the things we do at school.Peak Maths,write stories, spelling tests,english,draw,read,P.E., play games on the playground,we some- times go on walks,have homework,do handwriting,tables,play on the computer,painting. Sometimes we watch television.Our programme is called{ZigZag}. Once a year we go on a school trip. This year we went to{Shibden Hall} which is near {Halifax}. At {4.00 p.m.}we put our chairs up, say our prayers and then we go home.
